Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 174th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Earned first career win on 6/8/2015...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/12/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $6,125,001 per year...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 1/31/2018 (Going to SF: RF Filiberto Tomas, 3B Gaby Realego, P Kevin Nelson, P Edward Lawhon. Going to CIN: P Philip Finklea, P Alberto Fresno, P Rober
to Ortiz, 2B Estanis Aguilar, RF Fred Bondurant)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 2/3/2018 (Going to HOU: P Alberto Fresno, C Dennis Anstett. Going to CIN: P William Dacosta)...
Won World Series with Houston in 2018...
Traded from Houston to New York on 4/16/2019 (Going to HOU: C Carlos Villanueva. Going to NY: P Lee Wyrick, P Alberto Fresno)...
Injured on 6/3/2019 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/19/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $4,650,000 per year...
Injured on 4/30/2020 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2020 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/10/2021, off Martin Melendez (BOS)...
